mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (username, password, name, gender, student_id, phone, email, class_info, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{studentId}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{classInfo}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, student_id = #{studentId}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, class_info = #{classInfo}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
